subtitleNullable: 97,000+ Tweets from 5 mainstream Hindi news media sources in 2020.
descriptionNullable:
### Context and Inspiration

The core idea behind this dataset is to study the proliferation of Hindi news  from reputable sources concerning the COVID-19 first wave in India. This dataset can also be used for the following purposes:
- Understanding the popularity of news topics in Hindi news media
- Studying the propagation of 'fake news' in Hindi news media
- Studying the spread of clickbait in Hindi news media, as has been done by my paper. [Arxiv Link](https://arxiv.org/abs/2012.07609)
- Comparing different popular Hindi news sources and their journalistic practices
among others!

### Content

This dataset is a collection of 97,000+ tweets by 5 popular and reputed Hindi news sources: BBC Hindi, Dainik Jagran, Dainik Bhaskar, Hindustan and Navbharat Times from late 2019 till late 2020.

### Acknowledgements

I would like to acknowledge the 5 media houses whose tweets have been aggregated here and Twitter.
title: Mainstream Hindi Media Tweets, 2020
